actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide retention preference in reductions in force for employees who are former members of the Armed Forces retired on disability incurred in line of duty in wartime but caused by other than an instrumentality of war or injury or disease resulting from armed conflict.

summary.text: Authorizes retention preference in reductions in force for Federal employees who are former members of the Armed Forces retired on disability incurred in line of duty in wartime but caused by other than an instrumentality of war or injury or disease resulting from armed conflict.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide retention preference in reductions in force for employees who are former members of the Armed Forces retired on disability incurred in line of duty in wartime but caused by other than an instrumentality of war or injury or disease resulting from armed conflict.
